item.title: The Complete CTF Handbook
item.description: This handbook is a comprehensive compilation of notes and resources from the d4rkc0de-club/ctf-handbook GitHub repository, designed for beginners and enthusiasts in the world of Capture The Flag competitions. Introduction What actually are CTFs ? A CTF is like a puzzle game for hackers. In simple words, we are given a machine or program which is hackeable and we get a string that we submit and we get points. The flags are usually in the form of FLAG {y0u-h4v3-f0und-4-fl4g}.
